com.b2international.snowowl.core.date

Interface DateFormatter


  • public interface DateFormatter
    Interface used to format Objects representing Dates, like the Date itself, or timestamps in Long value.
    Since:
    3.9

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.b2international.snowowl.core.internal.date.DateFormatterRegistry REGISTRY
      The registry containing cached DateFormatter instances for later use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format(Object date, String datePattern)
      Formats the specified object representing a date with the given datePattern, and return the result.
      Date parse(String formattedDate, String datePattern)
      Parses the given formattedDate with the given datePattern and return the result.

    • Field Detail

      • REGISTRY

        static final com.b2international.snowowl.core.internal.date.DateFormatterRegistry REGISTRY
        The registry containing cached DateFormatter instances for later use.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        String format(Object date,
              String datePattern)
        Formats the specified object representing a date with the given datePattern, and return the result.
        Parameters:
        date - - the date to format
        datePattern - - the pattern to use
        Returns:
        the formatted date as string

      • parse

        Date parse(String formattedDate,
           String datePattern)
    throws ParseException
        Parses the given formattedDate with the given datePattern and return the result.
        Parameters:
        formattedDate - - the date to parse
        datePattern - - the pattern to use
        Returns:
        - the parsed date object
        Throws:
        ParseException - - if the date object cannot be parsed from the given string
